text:
Full Stack Developer / New Haven, CT -- Local Only

Prometheus Research (http://prometheusresearch.com) is looking for mid/senior level full stack developer to help us build out an open source informatics platform and customized applications for medical researchers. We use Python, PostgreSQL, JQuery and are tinkering with React. Please email hn-201403@prometheusresearch.com if you're curious to discuss this further. Thank you.
